actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the sale or transfer of a firearm to, or the possession if a firearm by, any person who is intoxicated.

summary.text: Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to prohibit the transfer of a firearm to, and possession of a firearm by, a person who is intoxicated from the use of alcohol or a controlled substance. Mandates that the statement from the transferee to transferor required by such Act specify that the transferee is not so intoxicated.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the sale or transfer of a firearm to, or the possession if a firearm by, any person who is intoxicated.
